category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEAssign_support_incontext_below_consumed
preference.preference_description:
Enables the children of consumed Manufacturing Lines in Bill of Process structure to show in-context data. This has a performance impact if turned on. The default value is false.
Teamcenter needs to be restarted for any value change to take effect.
